pros: This is a comfortable sandal for most foot shapes and sizes
cons: The Velcro on the straps is short, and these sandals run large

customer_reviews.title: Funny how at times they feel/fit better walking in them ...
customer_reviews.text: So far outstanding! Funny how at times they feel/fit better walking in them than just sitting with them on. Great adjustment capabilities on all straps. They have not agitated my slightly swollen Achilles' tendon. Nor, the other foot with an old wound on the ball of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: H2o

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of sandals.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sandals I have found. I was glad to see one left for sale so that I can put them away for when my current pair wears out. Prompt shipping. The product was as described.
customer_reviews.author: Disco Dave

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and overall quality were good, however
customer_reviews.text: Size larger then what is printed on the sandal - actually falls off my foot without socks. Velcro straps stop working after a few months even when not used, ie, they pick up dirt and no longer stick and cannot be cleaned. Comfort and overall quality were good, however. My next pair will just have to have a hole and pin system for adjusting fit. I'd still consider Clarks for my next pair.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed including a cushioned insole. Although a little stiff, once broken in I expect they will feel comfortable. Lots of velcro straps for adjustment. Not sure all are needed.
customer_reviews.author: DrP

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are just what I expected from Clarks, a great product. I owned a previous pair and after wearing them out over 3 years bought a different manufacturer's "cheaper" pair. Wore them out in less than a year...
customer_reviews.author: Dave Igel

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal. I would have given this a five ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sandal. I would have given this a five star rating if it had not taken a week or two to break in enough to be comfortable all day. Once that time was over, it fit my foot like a glove. The heal was a bit higher than I was used to with my old Clarks sandals as well, but I quickly got used to that too. I really like these sandals. I expect to use them for years to come, as I did with my last Clarks sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Vergeer

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to size chart
customer_reviews.text: These were very well made, BUT ... the size chart said to order next size smaller. Husband wears 13 wide. Size chart said to order 12 medium. These were to small. Could not even get Velcro strap on top to close.
customer_reviews.author: glenda

customer_reviews.title: These are nice!
customer_reviews.text: New favorite Clark sandal! I wasn't sure I'd like the open insole (I liked the old Treks), but no issue and very comfortable!! As expected, well constructed with nice looking uppers!
customer_reviews.author: Phil G.

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to return
customer_reviews.text: Sadly these did not fit. They were too long and not wide enough. They were easy to return. I like my Clarks because they are comfortable and durable. I was hoping they would work for my husband's rare sized feet.
customer_reviews.author: Stess

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT - GREAT SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: As nice as I expected. My husband says they are very comfortable. Great service on this shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe with great support, my 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I had wore out and we live in a rural area with no brick and mortar stores. Am so glad Amazon had this product, I ordered the same size and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get into, protects my Neuroma, look good
customer_reviews.text: This is my replacement pair of these sandals for 5 or 10 year old ones that I loved. My left foot has a Neuroma, which makes the shoes that I wear important. With these Clarks, my Neuroma doesn't bother me. Additionally, I can set the straps so that I can insert my feet without having to set the straps each time and just step into them easily. I don't end up distorting the straps each time I put them on and they are tight enough so that I can walk appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Harnish

customer_reviews.title: Clarks replacement is a poor replacement
customer_reviews.text: Clarks changed the look and sizing. I wanted the Hudson sandal, which I found out after this order they no longer make. The Raffe is s very poor replacement and does not look like the same old Clarks quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Newton

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves me
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves this. It could have been a bit bigger but he still says he could sleep in it. Reviewing this 2 years later
customer_reviews.author: campbell

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my dad but too big for him ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad but too big for him. Size is somewhat big. Wasn't able to return because it lapse.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking sandal
customer_reviews.text: I like the sandal even though it is not as comfortable as the Clark Merrimack sandal. I hope that over time they will break - in but if they don't I will still like them .
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: ... give plenty of support for my father and are comfortable. This price was actually cheaper than we had ...
customer_reviews.text: They give plenty of support for my father and are comfortable. This price was actually cheaper than we had planned on paying which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good is what I think my rating would have been ...
customer_reviews.text: About a full size larger then I expected. Good is what I think my rating would have been if I had not returned them.
customer_reviews.author: DMarshall2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very comfortable. Easy to put on and take off. Nice material and very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: bbezenek

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Not my first pair of Clarks....but, still awesome as always. Superior construction and incredibly comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Appledoodle

customer_reviews.title: Cool Walking!
customer_reviews.text: Super sandals! Super fit! Can wear them all day, great cushion.
customer_reviews.author: curt satter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Sandals
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes it. Well made sandals, for now. :-)
customer_reviews.author: AZ AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: A super present for my brother!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals were a gift to my brother. He was totally happy with them. The fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Boz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality as expected from Clarks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Dad & he loves them. Excellent quality as expected from Clarks.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: The leather and Velcro were still in good
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat Clarks for quality. These replaced a pair that were over 20 years old. Finally wore hole in the rubber sole. The leather and Velcro were still in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair so I am confident I will like them as much as I loved my first pair
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to wear them all day. Going to Hawaii in next 10 days so will know more. This is my second pair so I am confident I will like them as much as I loved my first pair. May change my rating when I get back--hopefully to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price! These are the most comfortable sandals I've ever owned! I LOVE my sandals!
customer_reviews.author: carl perkins

customer_reviews.title: Has elastic under buckle snap area. Made it smaller
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. In description did not show or say there was elastic under snap buckle area. Made it smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: VG soles, can walk over rocky surfaces without discomfort. Uppers are VG quality genuine leather. Innersole surface beneath foot is soft and padded.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. So comfortable! A great improvement over my previous sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin F. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Best sandalselling ever
customer_reviews.text: Best sandalselling ever!! The fit was perfect and the "feel" is just right! Thank you for the quality of these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sandals just need to be careful when adjusting straps
customer_reviews.author: TAW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and fiit
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are made with outstanding quality and are quite comfortable. I needed the wide version, and with only a single wide selection, I was a little concerned about the fit. However, I found the fit to be perfect for me. The sandals are a little pricey, but in this case they were worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sussman

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and comfortable. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband and he LOVES them. Very well made and comfortable. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: tiffaney_311

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Clarks - first one lasted 11 years.
customer_reviews.author: Voltaire

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable fit for me even though my shoe size is ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit larger than expected. Not a comfortable fit for me even though my shoe size is 7.5 us. Would probably fit better in a half size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Aleem Backredee

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was very much surprised how they felt on my lettle footsy. wow.
customer_reviews.author: PhxTechup

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sandals, even my husband likes them... Which is not such an easy sell.
customer_reviews.author: brinlisa

customer_reviews.title: High Quaility and Comfortable from Day One.
customer_reviews.text: High quality and comfortable fit are the hallmark of all Clarks shoes that I have purchased. The only problem with Clarks shoes is that you can never wear them out so you need to make certain that you are happy with them from day one. My old Clarks sandals, that these replaced, are over 8 years old and still very wearable and comfortable. A good cleaning with saddle soap has made them good as new. If the new Raffle Coast Fisherman sandal last 1/2 as long, I will be a most happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: G. J. Reiser

product_meta.title: Clarks Raffe Coast
product_meta.description: Stay fresh and stylish this summer all thanks to the fantastic new Clarks Raffe Coast men's sandals! With an incredible construction these sandals were meticulously crafted with full grain and nubuck leather for outstanding longevity. With a textile lining as well as a hook and loop closure for an easier and more accessible on and off experience, it also boasts of a lightweight EVA outsole that will provide you with perfect support and traction so you can confidently stroll about your day. So get your new go-to shoes for the summer in the new Clarks Raffe Coast.
